name: overgrow

effect.ruby_sapphire: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
effect.emerald: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
effect.firered_leafgreen: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
effect.colosseum: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
effect.xd: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

short_effect: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Ups GRASS moves in a pinch.
flavor_text.emerald: Ups GRASS moves in a pinch.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Ups GRASS moves in a pinch.
